attributes.action: The cost of your rent payment should be part of a credit reference check .
attributes.additional_details: While rent payments are always unicluded in credit reference checks, this needs to change, as rent is always more than a mortgage monthly payment. So it should be be included in an credit agency check. This would help the housing market also.
attributes.background: Include the cost of rent payments to a credit reference agency.

rejection.details: The preparation and scoring of credit reports is a matter for individual credit reference agencies in cooperation with lenders, not the Government or Parliament.
